user_stories.title: As a user, I want to initialize project repository
user_stories.description: Create a new Git repository, set up basic project structure (e.g., frontend, backend directories), and add a .gitignore.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Initialize Project Repository
Then Create a new Git repository, set up basic project structure (e.g., frontend, backend directories), and add a .gitignore.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to set up ci/cd pipeline
user_stories.description: Configure a CI/CD pipeline (e.g., GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins) for automated testing and deployment.
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Set up CI/CD Pipeline
Then Configure a CI/CD pipeline (e.g., GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins) for automated testing and deployment.

user_stories.title: As a user, I want to cloud infrastructure provisioning
user_stories.description: Provision necessary cloud resources (e.g., VPC, compute instances, database service) using Infrastructure as Code (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
acceptance_criteria: Given the user needs Cloud Infrastructure Provisioning
Then Provision necessary cloud resources (e.g., VPC, compute instances, database service) using Infrastructure as Code (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation).
